QuestData.Title: Silver Tide Hollow
QuestData.Description: Most of the other Earthen Ring that escaped the massacre on the boats have taken shelter in a cave a short swim down from the ridge. It's tucked midway up a huge rock formation, west of Nespirah, the gigantic shell on the horizon. I need you to make sure they're okay. There's no telling how many naga might have attacked them as well.$B$BI'm going to hunt down that Fathom-Lord. I'll send word if I find the rock he's hiding under.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Felora Firewreath in Silver Tide Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: A friendly face! Welcome!$B$BVery kind of you to come check on us. We're fine. A naga scouting force did find us, but I'm pretty sure none escaped. We should be safe for now.
